description: Perfect as a side dish, this vegetarian recipe of mixed mushrooms roasted in a moreish garlic butter is sure to delight.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Garlic Butter Roasted Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Place mushrooms, cap-sides down, on a baking tray.
Place butter, oil, garlic and thyme in a small bowl and gently whisk with a fork. Spoon two-thirds of the garlic mixture over mushrooms and bake for 20 minutes or until golden.
Drizzle with remaining garlic mixture, squeeze over lemon juice and scatter over parsley. Season and serve.
